components.label: Property value (net of any mortgage borrowing(s) or other debts secured against the property)
components.name: applicant_before_order_property_value

components.label: Other capital, not held in a pension fund (e.g. savings, investments, shares money in bank accounts etc.)
components.name: applicant_before_order_capital

components.label: Debts (e.g. personal loans, credit cards or bank overdrafts), excluding mortgages and other debts that are secured against property
components.name: applicant_before_order_debts

components.label: Cash Equivalent value of pensions (excluding the basic/New State pension, but including the Additional State Pension)
components.name: applicant_before_order_pensions

components.label: Monthly earned income (net of tax and NI contributions)
components.name: applicant_before_order_earned_income

components.hint: Enter a positive value(+) if paid by the respondent to the applicant and a negative value (-) if paid by the applicant to the respondent
components.label: Monthly child support, paid or received
components.name: applicant_before_order_child_support

components.hint: Enter a positive value(+) if paid by the respondent to the applicant and a negative value (-) if paid by the applicant to the respondent
components.label: Other monthly periodic payments paid or received (other than child support)
components.name: applicant_before_order_other_periodic_payments
